node.html: Program of 9 skill-building courses done over a period of almost a year, covered various subjects of Data Science             in-depth.
Program consisted of 6 related courses, learnt the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence and their applications using IBM Watson and OpenCV in Python.

frontmatter.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt - Anexas (Accredited to IASSC)

node.html: Rigorously trained and gained knowledge about the tools of Lean and Six Sigma, primarily the DMAIC model. Passed the certification exam to hold the title of 'Green Belt'.
